     { "portCfg" : [
    { "hwCfg" : { "connection" : "pacificControl",
                         "url" : "file:pacificControl.json",
                    "interval" : 5 }
    },

      • setValueFromUrl

        private void setValueFromUrl(java.lang.String port,
                             java.lang.Number value)
        Requests a set action to an actor with a http request. The basic elements of the URL are defined in configuration. 
         rootpath/request/set?point-name&new-value&set-priority
        Parameters:
        port - The name of the port
        value - The new value to be set

      • getPorts

        public java.util.Collection<PortDescription> getPorts()
        Returns the available ports and their properties. The configuration must contain "connection" : "pacificControl"
        If parameter "url" is invalid, the program terminates.
         { "hwCfg" : { "connection" : "pacificControl",
               "url" : "file:pacificControl.json",
               "urlSet" : "http://pcSrv.json/set",
               "interval" : 30 } }
  }
        Specified by:
        getPorts in interface HardwareDriverInterface
        Returns:
        the port properties
